text: Franca Falcucci (22 March 1926 - 4 September 2014) was an Italian politician. She was a member of the Christian Democracy Party. She served as a member of the Senate and was the first woman to become Minister of Public Education. Falcucci died on 4 September 2014 in Rome, Italy, aged 88. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Politicians from Rome
title: Franca Falcucci
